title: My Laptop Freezes for 1-2 Games of League...
body:
So, recently, I bought a new laptop to play League on. Here are the specs:-

Intel i5-7200
NVIDIA GeForce 940MX
8 GB RAM
1 TB Hard Drive

Like the title says it itself, my laptop freezes the first few games I play after turning on the laptop. But after 5 to maybe 7 games, it's normal, although I have to keep the same settings (60FPS + Low Resolution). Anyone know to why this might've happened?

replies.body: The fan usually go to turbo mode after 7-8 games of League (meaning it's starting to overheat). Regarding the hardware, I'm not sure if anything is at fault, however, I did get an upgrade of RAM from 4GB to 8GB and was upgraded by the technician.

This sounds like a possible hardware issue or even overheating, so double check your air vents just in case to make sure it's clear.  Otherwise, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well, and our tech team can help figure out what's going on.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
